targets.query: SELECT NON_NEGATIVE_DERIVATIVE(SUM("value"),1s) AS rps FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter AND "name"='POST /api/predict' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT PERCENTILE("value",95) AS p95 FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "name"='POST /api/predict' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS error_rate FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE $timeFilter AND "name"='POST /api/predict' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("usage_active") AS cpu_total FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter AND "cpu"='cpu-total' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("used_percent") AS mem_used FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT PERCENTILE("value",95) AS p95 FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "name"='POST /api/predict' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT MEAN("value") AS avg FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "name"='POST /api/predict' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
